name: NetMeeting User Location Service File
summary: Learn about .ULS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NetMeeting was part of Windows XP, but is not included with Windows Vista. It has been replaced by Windows Meeting Space and Microsoft Office Live Meeting.

description: Contains information about an Internet location; used by Microsoft NetMeeting to connect users to each other; the Internet Locator Server (ILS) sends a file called "Ulserver.uls" to clients with IP address and port information.
